inclusion.criterion: Physically and neurologically healthy [confirmed by a comprehensive medical history]
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Current PTSD diagnosis [related to civilian trauma]
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Experience with a civilian trauma without a PTSD diagnosis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Free of a lifetime Axis I or Axis II diagnosis
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Clinically significant medical or neurological condition
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Less than a high school education
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Currently pregnant; planning pregnancy; or lactating
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Unwilling/unable to sign informed consent document
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Inability to tolerate small, enclosed spaces without anxiety (e.g. claustrophobia)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of severe 'exploding' headache following a head injury, and was diagnosed with an arteriovenous malformation (AVM). She is currently experiencing improving headaches with pain medication. She refused PT evaluation but ambulates independently without difficulty.
